addr: 1125 N McCadden Pl Los Angeles, CA 90038
title: The Written Word As Art - Exploring the Art of Creative Writing
desc: Embark on a journey through the wonderful world of creative writing. Explore different styles of writing through various exercises, including: poetry, character development and expository assessment. This course will also engage and challenge you to develop and create your own personal projects.? Instructor:  Giovanni Hortua ? Course Meeting Schedule: Sat., Mar. 5, 12, 19, 26 & Apr. 2 Course Meeting Times: 11 a.m. - 1 p.m.
